attributes.action: Hold a referendum on legalisation of cannabis for a) recreation b) medical use
attributes.additional_details: People of colour are x12 more likely to be arrested for cannabis offenses compared to others. Decriminalisation would remove racial bias. Underfunded police can reallocate time to more important issues. Legalisation is already favoured in public opinion. YouGov 2021. Covid caused financial damage, cannabis offers large tax revenue, like alcohol and cigarettes suggesting we could raise £1bn annually. Jobs would be created, demand for benefits would fall & payroll taxes would increase.
attributes.background: Hold a legally binding referendum on legalisation of cannabis/by-products for medical & recreational use. Build a regulated & legal market. The war on drugs is ineffective, expensive & racially biased. Legalisation offers the opportunity for large tax revenue, ensure safe consumption, & creates jobs

rejection.details:
